title: Java Fundamentals
goal: Understand the fundamentals of Java to build a solid foundation.

title: Introduction to Spring Boot
goal: Learn the basics of Spring Boot and set up a new project.

title: Spring Boot Data and REST
goal: Learn to build RESTful APIs with Spring Boot and connect to a database.

title: Introduction to Angular
goal: Learn the fundamentals of Angular and how to build a basic application.

title: Angular Forms and Routing
goal: Learn to create forms and handle routing in Angular.

title: Connecting Spring Boot with Angular
goal: Learn how to connect a Spring Boot backend with an Angular frontend.

title: Introduction to TypeScript
goal: Learn the fundamentals of TypeScript and how to use it with Angular.

title: Introduction to MongoDB
goal: Learn the basics of MongoDB and how to use it with Spring Boot.

title: Introduction to Apache Kafka
goal: Learn the basics of Apache Kafka for building event-driven applications.

title: Introduction to Jenkins
goal: Learn how to use Jenkins for continuous integration and deployment.

title: Advanced Java Concepts
goal: Learn advanced Java concepts like concurrency and streams.

title: Capstone Project
goal: Build a complete Java full-stack application from scratch.
